mapper.insert: insert into feedback (project_id, title, description, create_by, create_time, update_by,update_time,images) values (#{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(),#{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(),#{images,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update feedback set project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = NOW(), images = #{images,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, project_id, title, description, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag, images from feedback where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and del_flag='0'
select id, project_id, title, description, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag, images from feedback where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and del_flag='0'
